dsOverview.title: Australian Southern Hemisphere Tropospheric Analyses, daily from April 1972 to December 1992

summary.p: From the Australian National Meteorological Research Centre, twice daily Southern Hemisphere grids on a polar stereographic projection. DSS derived the monthly mean grids. Later and ongoing data may be available directly from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology.

Unless you have a special interest in this dataset, DSS recommends that you use one of our reanalysis datasets, such as ds090.0, because those are based on a more complete collection of observations, improved analysis methods, and are provided in a common modern format (GRIB).

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: AU/BOM/BMRC > Bureau of Meteorology Research Centre, Bureau of Meteorology, Australia
